name: mypy
description: Type checking and rich language features for Python using mypy.
author: Matan Gover

mypy.executable.description: Path to mypyls executable (see installation instructions).

mypy.configFile.description: Mypy config file, relative to the workspace folder. If empty, search in the default locations. See https://mypy.readthedocs.io/en/latest/config_file.html.

mypy.targets.description: List of paths to analyze, relative to the workspace folder. By default, check the entire workspace folder.

scripts.vscode: npm run vscode:prepublish && VSCODE=$(which code-insiders || which code || echo echo ERROR: neither the code nor code-insiders vscode executable is installed); USER=dummy-dont-share-vscode-instance $VSCODE --user-data-dir=$PWD/.vscode-dev/user-data --extensionHomePath=$PWD/.vscode-dev/extensions --extensionDevelopmentPath=$PWD $*
